programme.title: The Art Scene
programme.desc: It's not 24 frames a second which makes a film, it's the blood, sweat and tears of an army of creative minded people who want to tell a story; A story which has the power to move, tickle or scare people sitting in a dark hall of a theatre. How did Singapore found it's niche in film making? Watch it all in this next episode of The Art Scene- The Art of Film.

programme.title: The World's Deadliest Weather S3
programme.desc: Nature is a tempestuous beast, capable of destruction on a level so devastating it has claimed the lives of millions. Using incredible archive and footages, We'll relive these weather spectacles, revealing very personal stories of people who have captured the entire event.

programme.title: Just For Laughs Gags S21
programme.desc: Just For Laughs will tickle everyone's funny bone with its hilarious practical jokes, hidden camera pranks, and other creative hijinks.

programme.title: CAMOKAKIS: Whole Lot Fall In!
programme.desc: Paul, Laanya and celebrity guests Calvert Tay, Iskandar Shah, Inch Chua, Claire Jedrek and Jonathan Chua join the elite Naval Diving Unit and find out whether they've got what it takes to survive the training to become Frogmen.

programme.title: Planet Action
programme.desc: Planet Action is a fast-paced series that brings you right to the edge of your seat. From cowboy shoot-outs, to exploding cars, stunt scenes, fights in space, and roaring monsters, Planet Action takes you behind the scenes of the best action movies released.

programme.desc: Winner of Daytime Emmy Awards 2020 and 2021 for Outstanding Entertainment Talk Show Host and Outstanding Entertainment Talk Show. Won Outstanding Lighting Direction and Outstanding Art Direction/Set Decoration/Scenic Design for Daytime Emmy Awards 2020.

programme.title: Super Wings S5: Super Pets
programme.desc: Jett delivers some special movie making equipment to a boy named Riley who's visiting an alien themed festival in Argentina. Riley wants to be a film director and his dream is to make an alien movie so he's here hoping to find the best costumed person for his movie.

programme.title: Winx Club - Eighth Series
programme.desc: Bloom discovers that Sky is on a mission with her ancient rival Diaspro, so she quarrels with him. The two will have to get together and make up, if they want to recover the star before the Trix. The Winx and Sky leave for Horn Tower, where the Prime Star should be, but are attacked by the Trix. Bloom and Sky manage to prove they trust each other and recover the star...

programme.title: Blaze And The Monster Machines S4
programme.desc: A monster truck and his human driver go on adventures together while learning about science, technology, engineering and math.

programme.title: Deer Squad S1
programme.desc: Kai, Lola, Rammy and Bobbi are four heroic young deer that protect the animals who live in Central Forest and the people living in Platinum City.

programme.title: Ollie And Friends S6
programme.desc: The Imp is being chased down in the middle of a heist when he discovers his powers might have a connection with Sloppy's self-fixing glue. He decides to follow Sloppy to his workshop and find out what's going on. Blue Square wants more friends on Ollipost! He takes the advice of a mysterious new Ollipost friend and pranks Ollie to get popular.

programme.title: Go Jetters S3
programme.desc: Go Jetters go bigger as our plucky international heroes Xuli, Kyan, Lars and Foz, together with their disco-grooving mentor Ubercorn, discover lots more about our world. And we learn much more about each of the Go Jetters too. Travelling from the top of the planet to the very bottom, their action-packed adventures take them to truly incredible places. And there's a good chance Grandmaster Glitch has got there first to cause his usual chaos!

programme.title: Tanglin
programme.desc: After discovering that Pam is going out with Wayne, Shruti shares her reservations about him to Pam. But Pam brushes it off. Ben goes full speed ahead with the adoption process. Meanwhile, competition heats up between Wafiq and Khairul over Izzy.

programme.title: The Flying Chef
programme.desc: Combining his love for food, adventure, scuba diving and travel, world renowned Australian chef Nathan Huxham takes us on a culinary adventure through the remote islands of Indonesia. He travels to Birra and cooks with coconut water.

programme.title: Rachel Allen: All Things Sweet Christmas Special
programme.desc: This festive edition of Rachel Allen: All Things Sweet has the much-loved cook and broadcaster showcasing delicious recipes as well as passing on tips to help viewers create these treats themselves. Rachel shakes up the traditional dessert menu and serves up something a little different for the holiday season, with some exciting flavours and aromas to help viewers create a memorable Christmas. Dishes include festive fruity steamed pudding, mulled port pears with port jelly, etc.

programme.desc: When it comes to traditional Italian and Thai food, you can't go past a classic Bolognese and Marion's Pad Thai. And what about everyone's favourite desserts, the magical deep fried ice-cream and Italian's Iconic Tiramis? And lastly, Marion and Silvia take the humble egg to new heights with a spectacular crab omelette and the ultimate.

programme.title: Island Feast with Peter Kurivita Special
programme.desc: Peter takes the route less travelled through a region bursting with cultural diversity. After island-hopping through the Philippines and then Indonesia, Peter travels to Vanuatu, and finally on to the beautiful Cook Islands. Through heartfelt interactions with local families, Peter experiences the spirit of each community's rich culture and learns the secrets of their unique cuisines. Then he brings it all home to Noosa to experience a truly Australian Christmas.

programme.title: Jamie's Easy Christmas Countdown
programme.desc: It's the night before Christmas and Jamie's in the kitchen, showing us his tried and tested secrets of a show-stopping, stress-free Christmas Day. We all know cooking over the holidays can be nerve-wracking, even for experienced cooks. To make sure all of our festive feasts go off with a bang, Jamie's sharing how he plans his day and prepares as much as possible in advance. programme.title: 镇乡之宝
programme.desc: (PG) 锆石，是地球上最古老的矿物之一，形成约两百万年前。柬埔寨的腊塔纳基里省，又名‘宝石山'的镇乡之宝，就是独特的蓝色锆石！锆石产业是这里的主要经济命脉，为当地土著带来了可观的收入，并改变了他们的生活面貌。.

programme.title: 尚食
programme.desc: (PG)(首播) 永乐十九年，大明朝风调雨顺，国泰民安。为招待源源不绝的各国使节团，永乐帝不拘一格，昭选天下擅烹的女子入宫，充大明尚食局掌膳之选。经过重重选拔，少女姚子衿入选为尚食局宫女，巧遇同样参选的殷紫萍、苏月华等人。三人奇计百出，创新百道新鲜菜色，更令历代古籍名肴重现人间。子衿一步步从宫女到典膳，烹饪技术渐臻佳境，更和皇太孙朱瞻基萌生出真挚的情感。从二人一波三折的感情故事中，展现出明朝三位杰出帝王的历史功绩与家庭生活，描绘出一幅洋溢着浓郁亲情、友情、爱情，充满着人情味的古代文化生活画卷。.

programme.desc: The show revolves around the village of Kalaripuram - which preserves and practices the ancient martial art of Kalaripayattu and follows the day-to-day lives of two competing gurukuls.
